name: 賀一平
objective:
本課程涵蓋的主題包含句法，語意，構詞，語用，心理語言，社會語言，語言學習等簡介，作為更進一步語言（母語／外語）學習，教學，研究的基礎。
This course covers the basic ideas on the following sub-topics:  pragmatics, discourse analysis, syntax, semantics, morphology, phonetics & phonology, psycholinguistics, sociolinguistics and language acquisition, serving as a stepping stone for further research on linguistics, language learning and teaching or other language-related study.
